resources.string: Welcome to PantryMate, the inventory organisation app. Our aim is to make your life easier by summarising what food you have at home and when it will expire. There are a few different ways for food items to be added or removed from your online pantry, this help page will show you how each one works.

The edit page is used to manually change the information inside your pantry. Add allows you to put new items in your pantry. This requires you to input the food item(s) name, quantity of the item and the items expiry date. Edit lets you change information on the items that are already in the database. Remove allows you to manually remove an item from the pantry.

Take a picture of your food items using your phone’s camera, and the app will add those items automatically to your pantry. For better results, make sure the room is well lit, the food items are spaced apart and that the packaging doesn’t obscure what the food looks like. (work in progress)
Use your phone camera to scan the barcode of your food items. The app will then add those items automatically to your pantry. (work in progress)
Find a bug? Create an issue on our github page to let us know - https://github.com/ImogenWilks/PantryMate/issues
To delete an item just swipe from right to left and watch it disappear!
To edit an item simply press on it in the pantry items list and a window will appear allowing you to edit the item\'s details.
In order to add an item simply click the + button to the left of the screen and fill in the details. After filling out the required fields simply press submit and the item will appear in your pantry.
"To add an item simply click the + button to the left of the screen and fill in the details. Don't worry about the expiry date, this will added when you scan or tick an item off your list!
To remove an item all you need to do is swipe from right to left!

To tick an item off your list you can either press the scan button and scan a valid barcode or you can simply swipe from left to right. After ticking off an item it will be automatically added to your pantry.
The item you\'ve scanned partially matches the following, simply click the item to check it off your list!
Alternatively if you\'ve bought something not on your list, press add and we\'ll put it into your pantry for you.
To add an item manually simply click the + button and fill in the details, don\'t worry about the expiry date for now.

To scan a receipt press the scan button and take a clear picture of your receipt in good lighting. You will then be prompted to crop the receipt, please do this around the food item names only (excluding quantity). If its read in wrong don\'t worry, you can edit it afterwards.
To add your scanned results into your main pantry simply click the \'add to pantry\' button at the bottom.

To scan a barcode press the \'scan barcode\' button and take a clear picture of your barcode. You will then get a pop up with the name of your item. You can re-try if this is incorrect or manually add it for barcode information that can not be found.
To add an item click the + button and fill in the required details.
